profile:
With over 20 years experience, A & E Environmental is a leader in mold and asbestos remediation.  Our certified technicians will analyze and identify all problem areas and provide our homeowners with a detailed breakdown of how to effectively and cost efficiently get the job done without breaking the bank!
Trying to sell? let us close the deal on your attic, bathroom and basement mold problems. Home inspections can shed a new light on underlying mold and asbestos issues.  Commonly these issues are brought to the surface causing havoc to homeowners. 

Our professionals are fully insured and certified to identify various levels of mold and asbestos, therefore determining the type of procedures required to remediate, adhering to all provincial standards and guidelines.  Your safety is our priority.  Leave the worries to us! We look forward to working with you!  

** Contact us TODAY for a non chemical botanical disinfectant for your home! This treatment is approved for disinfecting COVID 19. Check out the product here: https://benefect.com/ca/products/decon-30/

profile:
MoldTech is one of the oldest and most respected mold remediation and inspection firms serving Toronto and the Greater Toronto Area. We service residential, commercial, and industrial sectors, and can help you understand your unique situation, with qualified instruction on the best solution possible.

Our Mold Inspections, Indoor Air Quality Testing and Mold Removal services in Toronto have been developed with years of practical experience and ongoing education. Our goal is to provide great service above and beyond that of our competitors. Once you suspect a Mold problem and make that first call, you will talk to one of our Mold Professionals that can quickly help you understand the extent of the problem and schedule a Mold Inspection at a convenient time for you. We make the process systematic and most of all, calm and efficient.

At MoldTech, from top to bottom and beginning to end, taking pride in what we do is our standard. We really do care! Weâ€™re not going to send anyone to work in your home or business that we wouldn't want working in ours. Therefore as a company, we know you are getting the highest level of care and service which starts by talking to a company representative that knows Mold, not an answering service.

If you suspect Mold and want an honest, informative and common sense approach to mold testing, mold inspection and mold removal, you should book an inspection, you won't be disappointed. You and your family deserve to live in a safe and healthy environment. Mold can seriously compromise the structural integrity of your home, and adversely affect your familyâ€™s health and well-being.

products:
Fiberlock, Aegis among other products to ensure maximum effectiveness for our mould removal.

Aegis- Mould prevention product
-Provides protection against odour causing bacteria, fungus and other microorganisms
-Permanently bonded antimicrobial barrier
-Registered with the EPA since 1976 and PMRA since 1997 and also registered in the UK and Asia
Remember, the first and best defense is a good offense. The importance of having a microbial pollutant control and prevention component as part of your contingency plan and having a baseline of knowledge about the microbial habitats in your building is essential. The usefulness of a proven long-lasting, effective antimicrobial treatment which offers protection from the re-growth of microorganisms is also essential.

profile:
The Concord Group began as a carpet cleaning company in 1983. As our business gained a reputation for quality and customer satisfaction, we began receiving requests for other services. Eventually the volume of requests led us to expand to renovations, interior and exterior decor, painting, electrical, plumbing, and a number of other services.

The Concord Group has become a one-stop-shop for all your home and business needs. We began as a small family organization and although we have grown ten-fold throughout the years, we maintain our dedication to providing a friendly and courteous environment. We pride ourselves on our prompt reliable service, which is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

We offer water and flood damage repair, waterproofing, mould removal, carpet cleaning, and home renovations and restoration. We pride ourselves on our prompt reliable service, which is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
